programme.title: Forest fires, tornadoes and earthquakes
programme.short_synopsis: An examination of extreme weather in America.
programme.medium_synopsis: A season of disaster, forest fires, tornadoes, earthquakes and leads to a recollection of a vast storm in 1938 which descended on the Northern Atlantic coast.
